name: electron-app
description: An Electron application with Vue and TypeScript
author: example.com

scripts.typecheck: npm run typecheck:node && npm run typecheck:web
scripts.package:win: rm -rf ./node_modules && npm_config_platform=win32 npm_config_arch=x64 npm install && npm run build && electron-builder --win --config
scripts.package:mac:x64: rm -rf ./node_modules && npm_config_platform=darwin npm_config_arch=x64 npm install && npm run build && electron-builder --mac --x64 --config
scripts.package:mac:arm64: rm -rf ./node_modules && npm_config_platform=darwin npm_config_arch=arm64 npm install && npm run build && electron-builder --mac --arm64 --config
scripts.package:linux: rm -rf ./node_modules && npm_config_platform=linux npm_config_arch=x64 npm install && npm run build && electron-builder --linux --config
